title: Beneath our feet. Parts 1-3
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Geological time
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Geology - Australasia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Rocks, Igneous
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
description: The Scenery of Victoria looks at the landforms throughout the state and relates the actual location to its geological significance. "Geological history of Victoria" Very similar to Part 1, but made for year 10 science with more emphasis on the period of history each geological type fits into. "Granite" looks at the formation and coding processes that produce granite with emphasis on the seven types of rocks that are currently associated with granite.
